attributes.description:
A map of mascara suppliers and how this supply chain works.
Tip: Make sure to click in the connections for descriptions as they explain what is being supplied to the main manufacturers of the mascara.
attributes.title: Mascara Mania

attributes.address: Walgreen, 200 Wilmot Rd, Deerfield, IL 60015, USA
attributes.title: Walgreens

attributes.description: Receives supplies from Wanmei Packaging for their mascara.
attributes.title: Revlon International

attributes.description:
Cosmetic Packaging Company
Has numerous customers internationally.
attributes.title: Wanmei Packaging Co. Ltd

attributes.address: St George's Rd, Wimbledon, London Borough of Merton, SW19, UK
attributes.title: Rimmel London

attributes.description:
This company is a huge establishment that is a supplier several high end brands worldwide. Some of these brands include Playboy, Rimmel, Adidas, etc.

Coty brings in products from different suppliers who then brand the products and sell them.
attributes.address: 2 Park Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
attributes.title: Coty

attributes.description: Another leading beauty supply company. The headquarters is located in France but it is distributed throughout North America as well.
attributes.title: L'Oreal International

attributes.description: Beauty Supply company. Similar to Oil of Olay or Cover Girl in North America but located in and around Asia.
attributes.title: Shiseido Beauty Products

attributes.description: Leading brand in beauty care. Their mascara brushes come from a manufacturing company in China.
attributes.address: Procter & Gamble Plaza, Cincinnati, OH 45202, USA
attributes.title: Oil of Olay

attributes.description: This company produces mascara brushes for several companies including Oil of Olay, Shiseido, L'Oreal and Coty.
attributes.title: Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics

attributes.description: A manufacturing/ chemical company specializing in pellet pressing. This company deals with many chemical properties and processes. They have a foot in many industries including food, recycling, biomass, petfood, chemical, plant etc.
attributes.title: KAHL

attributes.description:
Yet another company involed in the production of coatings, polymers and chemical prooducts need to produce mascara.

Upon further investigation it came apparent that BASF (another supplier of chemicals on this map) actually bought out Ciba in 2009. 

See this website for more information: http://www.icis.com/v2/companies/9145171/ciba-specialty-chemicals.html

There is also a video. Apologies for the shakiness and the heavy accent on the speaker... =)
attributes.title: Ciba Specialty Chemicals

attributes.description: Croda specializes in a number of products. The most relative including polymers, glues, coatings etc. All chemical properties used in the process of making mascara.
attributes.address: Hall Close, Snaith, Goole, East Riding of Yorkshire DN14 9LF, UK
attributes.title: Croda Inc.

attributes.description:
Printing and Pigment company based out of the United States. Technologies in printing and colour in hundreds of industries.

See video for more information.
attributes.title: Sun Chemical

attributes.description:
Catalyst synthesis company
Chemistry based manufacturing
Dealing mainly with adsorbents and desiccants
attributes.title: BASF Catalysts Germany

attributes.description:
Importer
Exporter
Manufacturer
Produces Colour/Organic Colour Pigments:
Complex Red Organic Pigment, Industrial Organic Pigments, Organic Pigments, Red Organic Pigment and Synthetic Organic Pigments.
attributes.address: 235 Orenda Rd, Brampton, ON L6T 1E9, Canada
attributes.title: Degussa Canada Inc.

attributes.description:
**Main Manufacturer & Supplier of Mascara**
Distributor
Manufacturer
Exporter

15 to 20 million in sales
attributes.title: Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

attributes.description: Supplies Mascara manufacturer with the organic pigments used in their products.
attributes.title: Degussa Canada Inc. to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

attributes.description:
BASF provides the main mascara manufacturing with the chemical properties that go into the actual mascara solution. 
This may be due to the lack of chemistry labs available at the main supplier factory or simply no need to produce already existing technologies/ solutions.
attributes.title: BASF Catalysts Germany to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

attributes.description: Provides already developed cosmetic technologies in regards to colour. Sun Chemical has significant colour technologies for cosmetics that have hues that change depending on the angle, intense colours in a variety of cosmetics, etc.
attributes.title: Sun Chemical  to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

attributes.description: Provides polymers, lubricants and coatings for the manufacturing of mascara.
attributes.title: Croda International to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd
Ciba Specialty Chemicals to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

attributes.description:
This company supplies the mascara manufacturer with anything from polymer additives to plant extracts.

A lot more goes into plant extracts than one would originally expect.
attributes.title: KAHL to Zhejiang Weiya Cosmetics Co. Ltd

attributes.description: Supply of mascara brushes to Oil of Olay, one of the leading brands in beauty care.
attributes.title: Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics to Oil of Olay

attributes.description: Dalian provides products to this beauty supply company.
attributes.title: Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics to Shiseido Beauty Products
Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics to L'Oreal International

attributes.description:
Dalian provides Mascara brushes to Coty who then combines this with other supplies from different manufacturers so they can supply the brand names with what they need.

(Cool right! I didn't even know things like this existed!)
attributes.title: Dalian Meiyuan Cosmetics to Coty

attributes.description: This is one example of how the supply of several brands gets the product to the actual brand company.
attributes.title: Coty  to Rimmel London
Wanmei Packaging Co. Ltd to Revlon International
Wanmei Packaging Co. Ltd to L'Oreal International
